JOB DESCRIPTION: Job description      Integration Release of Software Components from internal and external suppliers and OEMs, mainly in Autosar Environment    Good in scripting knowledges : Python, Perl, Groovy, and shell    Good in SCM handling - Git, Plastic etc.    Experience in dockers/containers, and YAML    Automation of Software Integration    Setup, enhance and maintain Continuous Integration (CI) and development infrastructure for entire Autonomous driving SW solutions    Bench-Testing, HW-in-the-Loop and SW-in-the-Loop Testing and Adaptation of the test environment    Profound Knowledge in C in Embedded Context    Experience in Debugging, Emulation and Simulation Environments    Knowledge of QAC, Coverity, Vector Cast or similar tools for Static Code Analysis    Interfacing for development and quality assurance for internal teams and OEM
